name: Sarah, daughter of the blacksmith
text: Oh, hello there! Did you know that if you look really close, you can see all the colorful bugs playing in the dirt? They're my friends! Do you want to play with us too? They won't bite, I promise! Oh, or perhaps you'd like to meet Mr. Whiskers, my fantastic stuffed rabbit? He's always up for an adventure!

name: Sarah, daughter of the blacksmith
text: Oh, um, thank you? You're a bit funny! I'm just me, but I do have this neat rock collection, and I'm really good at spotting ladybugs. We could look for some together if you'd like!
